subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: With Sepp Blatter suspended, the top job at FIFA falls to Issa Hayatou, the son of a sultan from Cameroon who has ruled African soccer for 27 years.
snippet: With Sepp Blatter suspended, the top job at FIFA falls to Issa Hayatou, the son of a sultan from Cameroon who has ruled African soccer for 27 years.
